GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.4.218
GSD.description:
wifi: cfg80211: fix BSS refcounting bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.218 by commit 785eaabfe3103e8bfa36aebacff6e8f69f092ed7, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit a3584f56de1c808d4383a275b4a74467b19e5645. For more details please see the references link.
